about_the_game:
Critias Empire is a 4X Turn-Based Strategy game where you build your empire without war, combat and rival civilizations. Instead danger comes from Disasters rained down by the Gods of Olympus.

This is a game for those who like the empire building of 4X games, as opposed to war and conflict, but still want a challenging dynamic world to play in.





  • Build a mighty empire through careful resource and land management.
  • Prepare for disasters foretold and lead your people through tumultuous times.
  • Adapt your strategies to the capricious whims of the Gods.



This demo gives you a shortened scenario in which you must build the mighty Pyramids in order to appease Poseidon, god of the seas, and Haphaestus, the god of industry and volcanoes!

In the full Critias Empire game you will have a range of ways to build your empire and manage precious resources. To give you a flavour of what you can expect, here are some features that have already been made or are in production:

Transport - Bind your empire together and allow it to flourish by connecting far flung lands and distant cities. Unlocks the ability to build a network of roads and sea routes, which in turn boosts production of nearby tiles.

Oracle - Call upon the mystics and soothsayers of your empire to divine the true intentions of the Gods. Unlocks the ability to preview the effects of an upcoming disaster within a limited area, and with a variable amount of uncertainty.

Festivals - Appease the Gods and delight your citizens with extravagent celebrations. Unlocks the ability to throw festivals, which give time-limited boosts to your empire, at varying costs.

After full launch, we hope to continue adding features to the game, including genre fan favourites like tech trees and trade. That said, we won't release a feature if it isn't fun or somehow breaks the game. The order in which we develop and release the features may also change

Some more features we have concepted include: Leaders, Education, Health, Husbandry, Trade, Happiness, Politics, Tech Tree, City Buildings.



In Critias Empire, the ancient Gods are vengeful and scheming. They will rain disasters down on your civilization, altering the map as volcanoes spew lava, floods wash away the land and earthquakes cause mountains to rise and crumble.



Each God will have their own signature disaster. Pray too much to Zeus and Poseidon may get angry, and wash away your coastal settlements with a terrible storm!



Add Critias Empire to your Wishlist now to be notified when the game launches, due 2024.

short_description: Build the peaceful kingdom of Atlantis into a flourishing civilization, threatened only by the whims of the restless, vengeful gods of Olympus. Critias Empire is a 4X turn-based strategy game with disasters where you can grow and thrive without the pressure of war and combat.
